[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@verseengine/three-avatar](./three-avatar.md) &gt; [Avatar](./three-avatar.avatar.md)

## Avatar class

Avatar

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Avatar 
```

## Example


```ts
let resp = await fetch(url);
const avatarData = new Uint8Array(await resp.arrayBuffer());
const model = await loadAvatarModel(avatarData, renderer, false);
const avatar = new Avatar(model);
playerObj.add(avatar.object3D);

...

const clock = new THREE.Clock();
renderer.setAnimationLoop(() => {
  ...
  const dt = clock.getDelta();
  avatar.tick(dt);
});
```

|  [headBoneOffset](./three-avatar.avatar.headboneoffset.md) | <code>readonly</code> | THREE.Vector3 | Position offset from the head bone. |

|  [ikTargetRightArmBones](./three-avatar.avatar.iktargetrightarmbones.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [IKTargetBones](./three-avatar.iktargetbones.md) | IK target bones of right arm. |
|  [isIKMode](./three-avatar.avatar.isikmode.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | Get IK(Inverse Kinematics) mode or not. |
|  [object3D](./three-avatar.avatar.object3d.md) | <code>readonly</code> | THREE.Group | Object3D of this avatar. |
|  [syncTargetBones](./three-avatar.avatar.synctargetbones.md) | <code>readonly</code> | THREE.Bone\[\] | Bones to be synchronized. |

|  [widthZ](./three-avatar.avatar.widthz.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | Width along z-axis |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addExtension(ext)](./three-avatar.avatar.addextension.md) |  | Add an extension. |
|  [dispose()](./three-avatar.avatar.dispose.md) |  | Releases all resources allocated by this instance. |
|  [getHeadHeight()](./three-avatar.avatar.getheadheight.md) |  | Head height. Use to adjust the height of the XR camera. |
|  [getSyncBonesData()](./three-avatar.avatar.getsyncbonesdata.md) |  | Get bones motion. Use to synchronize to another location. |
|  [headSync(rotation)](./three-avatar.avatar.headsync.md) |  | Follow the avatar's head (neck) movements to the XR headset. |
|  [invisibleFirstPerson()](./three-avatar.avatar.invisiblefirstperson.md) |  | Hide avatar when in 1st person view. |
|  [lipSync(kiss, lipsClosed, jaw)](./three-avatar.avatar.lipsync.md) |  | Synchronize lip movements with the voice. |
|  [playClip(name)](./three-avatar.avatar.playclip.md) |  | <p>Play an animation clip. idle animation is playing by default.</p><p>Must be loaded beforehand by executing [preLoadAnimationData()](./three-avatar.preloadanimationdata.md)<!-- -->.</p> |
|  [removeExtension(ext)](./three-avatar.avatar.removeextension.md) |  | Remove an extension. |
|  [resetFaceExpression()](./three-avatar.avatar.resetfaceexpression.md) |  | Reset face expression to default. |
|  [setFaceExpression(name, value)](./three-avatar.avatar.setfaceexpression.md) |  | Set face expression. |
|  [setFirstPersonMode(cameras)](./three-avatar.avatar.setfirstpersonmode.md) |  | Switching the camera display to a first-person view. |
|  [setIKMode(v)](./three-avatar.avatar.setikmode.md) |  | Set to IK mode. |
|  [setSyncBonesData(syncBonesData)](./three-avatar.avatar.setsyncbonesdata.md) |  | Set bones motion. Synchronize data obtained with [Avatar.getSyncBonesData()](./three-avatar.avatar.getsyncbonesdata.md) at another location. |
|  [setThirdPersonMode(cameras)](./three-avatar.avatar.setthirdpersonmode.md) |  | Switching the camera display to third-person view. |
|  [stopClip()](./three-avatar.avatar.stopclip.md) |  | Stop an animation clip. |
|  [tick(deltaTime)](./three-avatar.avatar.tick.md) |  | Processes called periodically |
